original_text: so boring that even its target audience talked all the way through it .
generated_text:
1. "I fell asleep halfway through this snooze-fest."
2. "This movie was so dull, even the most die-hard fans checked their watches."
3. "I've seen more exciting paint dry than what was on screen here."
4. "The only thing that kept me awake was the sound of my own snoring."
